name: zssxr

body.origin:
|- wss(cz, cxr)
-| wss(cz, cr)
-| wss(cr, cxr)
body.pretty:
⊢ ℤ ⊆ ℝ*
⊣ ℤ ⊆ ℝ
⊣ ℝ ⊆ ℝ*

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cz, cxr)
-| wss(cz, cr)
-| wss(cr, cxr)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ℤ ⊆ ℝ*
⊣ ℤ ⊆ ℝ
⊣ ℝ ⊆ ℝ*

comment: The integers are a subset of the extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
